continentDescriptions.asia: 亚洲地区国家的国旗，包括东亚、东南亚、南亚、西亚和中亚
continentDescriptions.europe: 欧洲地区国家的国旗，多为三色旗和十字设计
continentDescriptions.africa: 非洲地区国家的国旗，多采用泛非色彩
continentDescriptions.northAmerica: 北美洲地区国家的国旗
continentDescriptions.southAmerica: 南美洲地区国家的国旗，多为蓝白红配色
continentDescriptions.oceania: 大洋洲地区国家的国旗，多含南十字星

continentTips.asia: 亚洲国旗文化多样，有星月图案、三色旗等多种设计风格
continentTips.europe: 欧洲国旗以简洁的三色条和十字图案为主，容易识别
continentTips.africa: 非洲国旗常用红、黄、绿三色，象征独立和自由
continentTips.northAmerica: 北美洲国旗设计多样，有条纹、徽章等不同元素
continentTips.southAmerica: 南美洲国旗常包含太阳、山脉等自然象征
continentTips.oceania: 大洋洲国旗常以南十字星和蓝底为代表海洋

memory.defaultTip: 认真学习这些国旗的特征和含义

continentDescriptions.asia: Flags of Asian countries, including East Asia, Southeast Asia, South Asia, West Asia and Central Asia
continentDescriptions.europe: Flags of European countries, mostly tricolor flags and cross designs
continentDescriptions.africa: Flags of African countries, mostly using Pan-African colors
continentDescriptions.southAmerica: Flags of South American countries, mostly blue, white and red color schemes
continentDescriptions.oceania: Flags of Oceanian countries, mostly containing the Southern Cross

continentTips.asia: Asian flags are diverse in culture, with various design styles such as star and moon patterns, tricolor flags
continentTips.europe: European flags are mainly simple tricolor stripes and cross patterns, easy to recognize
continentTips.africa: African flags often use red, yellow, and green colors, symbolizing independence and freedom
continentTips.northAmerica: North American flags are diverse in design, with different elements such as stripes and emblems
continentTips.southAmerica: South American flags often contain natural symbols such as sun and mountains
continentTips.oceania: Oceanian flags often feature the Southern Cross and blue backgrounds representing the ocean
